Duration and damage will improve with your Spellpower.
value.name: Stone Wall

value2.info_text:
Entomb yourself in a wall of stone for 9, 11, 13, 15, 16 turns.

At level 4, it becomes targetable.

Any hostile creature caught in the radius will also suffer 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 physical damage.

Duration and damage will improve with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Stone Wall

value.info_text: Open a hole in space, summoning an animated blade for 10 turns.
value.name: Animate Blade

value2.info_text: Open a hole in space, summoning an animate blade for 10 turns.
value2.name: Animate Blade

value.info_text: Your mastery of arcane flows allow you to reset the cooldown of up to 2, 4, 6, 7, 7 of your spells (that don't have a fixed cooldown) of tier 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 or less.
value.name: Metaflow

value2.info_text: Your mastery of the arcane flows allow you to reset the cooldown of 2, 4, 6, 7, 7 of most of your spells of tier 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 or less.
value2.name: Metaflow

value.info_text: Fire a slow bolt of a random element for 229, 324, 397, 458, 513 damage. Damage increases with the magic stat.
value.name: Elemental bolt

value.info_text: Fire a slow bolt of a random element for 229, 324, 397, 458, 513 damage. Damage increases with the magic stat.
value.name: Elemental Bolt

value.info_text: Spell damage done to it ripples in radius 4 doing 160% arcane damage.
value.name: Arcane Amplification Drone Effect

value.info_text:
You revel in death, devouring the souls of your victims. Whenever you inflict damage to a target, you deal an additional 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 darkness damage.

Additionally, you gain 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 souls whenever you score a kill.

The damage will scale with the highest of your spell or mind power and can only occur up to 15 times per turn.
value.name: Raze

value.info_text:
Release a cloud of deadly miasma over a targeted area, dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 darkness damage to all units inside it with a 20% chance of inflicting a disease that will do blight damage and weaken either Constitution, Strength or Dexterity for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns.

The damage will scale with the highest of your spell or mind power.
value.name: Infectious Miasma

value.info_text:
You surge with a life draining energy for 4, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

While the effect lasts, you heal yourself for 7%, 8%, 10%, 11%, 12% of all damage you deal.
value.name: Vampiric Surge

value.info_text:
You breathe a wave of deathly miasma in a cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 185, 240, 282, 316, 346 darkness damage over 4 turns and receive either a bane of confusion or a bane of blindness for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Magic, and the critical chance is based on your Spell crit rate.
value.name: Necrotic Breath

value.info_text:
You fire an incredibly potent shot at an enemy, doing 140%, 157%, 170%, 181%, 191% damage and dazing them for 3, 4, 5, 7, 8 turns.

The daze chance increases with your Steampower.
value.name: Ceasefire

value.info_text:
You fire an exceptionally lethal shot at an enemy, doing 140%, 157%, 170%, 181%, 191% damage.

Damage dealt by this talent is increased by half your critical multiplier, if doing so would kill the target.
value.name: Surekill

value.info_text:
You attune your saws to a specific target for 5 turns.

Each time you strike this target all damage done with steamsaws (including by other talents) is increased by +8%, +12%, +15%, +18%, +20%.

If you strike any other foe the bonus ends.

Metal your foes to death!
value.name: Continuous Butchery

value.info_text:
You send a saw mounted on an automated steam propulsor to assault a foe, dealing 43, 58, 69, 79, 88 physical damage each turn for 4 turns and silencing it.

At the end of the duration, the saw explodes for 220, 298, 359, 411, 456 fire damage and flies back, pulling the target up to 5, 8, 8, 9, 9 tiles towards you.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Explosive Saw

value.info_text:
When you kill a foe with a melee strike you quickly throw some of their remains in your steam engine, instantly regenerating 4, 7, 10, 12, 14 steam.

When you deal a critical melee strike you also have a 13%, 23%, 28%, 32%, 35% chance to cut a part of your foe and use it in your steam engine.

When either of those happens this strikes fear in all foes in radius 4 of the victim, brainlocking them for 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns.

To the meat grinder!
value.name: Mow Down

value.info_text:
You override all security measures of your tinkers, allowing you to reset the cooldown of 2, 4, 6, 7, 7 of most of your steamtech talents of tier 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 or less and instantly increases your steam level by 13%, 24%, 33%, 41%, 47% of the maximum.

In addition for 6 turns your maximum steam capacity is doubled, but steam regeneration is halved.

Master of Tech, Master of Death!
value.name: Tech Overload

value.info_text:
Sends a pulse detonator to the target. Upon arrival it explodes in radius 4 cone, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 physical damage, knocking back foes by 3 and dazing them for 1, 3, 3, 5, 7 turns.

Damage increases with your steampower.
value.name: Pulse Detonator

value.info_text:
You send a small steam-powered flying grapple to a target. The drone is homing so if the target moves it will follow.

When it reaches its target it deploys grapples in all directions around it in radius 4.

The grapples latch onto any foes and pull them toward the target. If they are stopped by a creature (or the target) both them and the creature take 121, 164, 197, 226, 251 physical damage.
value.name: Flying Grapple

value.info_text:
Sends a lightly electrified net of radius 2 toward a target, all creatures caught inside will be pinned in place for 5 turns.

While the electricity is not enough to do damage it does shock their body, reducing all resistances by 34%, 43%, 52%, 61%, 70%.
value.name: Net Projector

value.info_text:
For 4 turns many small saws circle around the target in radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4, making any creature caught inside bleed for 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 physical damage.

Damage increases with your steampower.
value.name: Sawfield

value.info_text:
You tessellate your cloak with small pieces of metal, providing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 damage reduction against all attacks.

The myriad metal scraps also help against incoming projectiles, providing a 35%, 44%, 51%, 57%, 62% chance of deflecting them to a nearby spot.
value.name: Automated Cloak Tessellation

value.info_text:
With a gesture of your cloak, you drop a small incendiary device in front of you, creating a wall of thick steam of 3, 5, 5, 7, 9 length that burns creatures passing it for 163, 221, 266, 304, 338 fire damage and blocks sight for 5 turns.

At level 5 the action is so perfect that your foes even lose track of you entirely.

Damage increases with your steampower.
value.name: Cloak Gesture

value.info_text:
Your cloak is lined with an automated health system that activate when no enemies are visible.

When it triggers, you will be healed for 170, 230, 277, 317, 352 life.

At talent level 3, it will also remove one detrimental physical effect.

The system can only trigger once every 9, 7, 6, 5, 5 turns.
value.name: Embedded Restoration Systems

value.info_text:
Trigger an array of small mirrors to appear all over your cloak.

The mirrors are positioned to reflect all light shining on you, granting 100, 135, 163, 186, 207 stealth power for 10 turns.

Stealth power increases with your steampower.
value.name: Cloaking Device

value.info_text:
Throw a small, unstable steam engine on the battlefield that will go critical after 2 turns.

It will then create an explosion of hot vapour in radius 1, 2, 2, 3, 3, burning all foes for 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 fire damage.

Any bleeding foe caught in the flames will take 40% more damage.

Damage scales with your Steampower.

Tick Tock Tick BOOM!
value.name: Explosive Steam Engine

value.info_text:
Explosive Steam Engine vapour now lingers for 5 turns.

Each turn, bleeding foes inside the cloud will take 56, 75, 91, 104, 115 fire damage.

Any steamtech-using creature will also regenerate 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 additional steam per turn while inside the cloud.

Damage scales with your Steampower.

Modern technology at the service of burnination!
value.name: Lingering Cloud

value.info_text:
Throw a tremor engine on the battlefield that will trigger after 2 turns.

For 5 turns after triggering, it will constantly shake the ground and stun, pin, or disarm any creature in radius 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The ground is mere paper to you!
value.name: Tremor Engine

value.info_text:
On its last pulse, your Tremor Engine shakes violently, raising a volcano for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

Each turn, the volcano will send out fiery boulders that deal 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 fire and 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 physical damage.

Damage scales with your Steampower.

All the fury of fire at your disposal!
value.name: Seismic Activity

value.info_text:
Firmly plant your steamsaws in the ground, using them to propel yourself very quickly (+320%, +398%, +459%, +510%, +556% movement speed).

Any foes on either side of your movement get wrecked by the saws, knocking them 3 tiles away from you.

Attacking or using any talent will break this effect.

When this effect is broken or cancelled the sudden change in motion deals 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% weapon damage to all foes around you. To do full damage you need to have moved at least 5 times, otherwise damage is lower (or null for no movement).

The wheels of death! Amazing!
value.name: Saw Wheels

value.info_text:
Spin your saws wildly around you to create a wall of steamy sawteeth.

All melee damage against you is reduced by 13%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27%, you have 13%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% chance to evade projectiles and you can never take a blow that deals more than 94%, 81%, 73%, 69%, 66% of your max life.

Split their bones on the saws of death!
value.name: Grinding Shield

value.info_text:
Slam your saws into your target, dealing 100% weapon damage + 12%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 33% per physical, magical, or mental effect on them (up to 7 effects).

Sustains are not effects.

The Metal Punisher!
value.name: Punishment

value.info_text:
You have lived through many battles, and your experience makes you a gritty veteran.

Saw Wheels end of effect attack increased by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35%.

Grinding Shield lets you live below your normal limits, up to -81, -154, -209, -256, -298 life.

Punishment has a 36%, 57%, 73%, 86%, 98% chance to have its cooldown reduced by 1 for each effect.

Domination for all!
value.name: Battlefield Veteran

value.info_text:
Working iron has honed your body into an amazing shape, granting 2, 5, 7, 10, 13 strength and constitution.

At talent level 5, you are so incredibly built that you gain one size category.
value.name: Massive Physique

value.info_text:
Working long hours at a forge has made you incredibly slow to tire and given you endless vitality.

Your healing factor is increased by 2%, 5%, 7%, 10%, 13% and your life regeneration by 1.30, 2.60, 3.90, 5.20, 6.50.

Stopping you is nearly impossible; your pinning resistance is increased by 19%, 39%, 58%, 78%, 97%.
value.name: Endless Endurance

value.info_text:
Slaving for many years at the forge has made you more resilient to physical pain and fire burns.

Your fire resistance is increased by 6%, 13%, 19%, 26%, 32% and your physical resistance by 3%, 7%, 11%, 15%, 19%.

At talent level 5, you are so accustomed to the flames that you become immune to the fireburn effect.
value.name: Life in the Flames

value.info_text:
You can easily see the weak points in your enemy's defenses. After all, you know to look for the same flaws in your own work.

This grants 5, 10, 15, 20, 26 armour penetration and 6%, 13%, 19%, 26%, 32% critical strike multiplier.

At talent level 5, you can also fight stealthed and invisible creatures without penalty.
value.name: Craftsman's Eye

value.info_text:
By sending a stream of hot steam over your bullets you overheat them. For the next 3, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns, each bullet will set the target ablaze, making it burn for 103, 140, 168, 192, 213 fire damage over 5 turns (most of your shooting talents fire two bullets at once).

Damage will increase with Steampower.

Only one bullet enhancement can be used at once.
value.name: Overheat Bullets

value.info_text:
You are able to polish your bullets so well they can go through multiple targets for 3, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns.

This also improves their armour penetration by 19, 24, 29, 32, 36.

Only one bullet enhancement can be used at once.
value.name: Supercharge Bullets

value.info_text:
You swap your bullets for more massive ones for 3, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns.

When striking a creature, these bullets have a 32%, 39%, 45%, 50%, 54% chance of knocking it back 3 tiles and a 14%, 20%, 26%, 30%, 34% chance of stunning it for 3 turns.

The chances to knockback and stun increase with your Steampower.

Only one bullet enhancement can be used at once.
value.name: Percussive Bullets

value.info_text:
You coat your bullets with flammable materials, for the next 3, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns each bullet will explode when it hits its target, dealing 85, 115, 139, 159, 176 fire damage to all foes within radius 2 (most of your shooting talents fire two bullets at once).

Damage will increase with Steampower.

Only one bullet enhancement can be used at once.
value.name: Combustive Bullets

value.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using steamsaws.
value.name: Steamsaw Mastery

value.info_text:
Channel hot steam around your saws, burning foes you strike in melee for 79, 108, 129, 148, 164 fire damage over 3 turns (which can stack)!

Hot, steamy maiming!
value.name: Overheat Saws

value.info_text:
Continuously swing your steamsaws around you, dealing 30% weapon damage to adjacent foes each time you attack.

Your chaotic motions make it difficult for anything to hit you, granting 17%, 22%, 25%, 28%, 30% chance to completely negate all damage.

Damage avoidance chance increases with Steampower.

Make the metal talk!
value.name: Tempest of Metal

value.info_text:
You temporarily overcharge the saw motors, increasing the effective talent level of all saw talents by 26%, 30%, 33%, 35%, 36% for 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns.

The pain shall never stop!
value.name: Overcharge Saws

value.info_text:
Allows you to create therapeutic tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Fiery Salve

* Botanical Shell

* Second Skin

* Alchemist's Helper

* Moss Tread

* Pain Suppressor Salve

* Healing Salve

* Antimagic Shell

* Water Salve

* Frost Salve

* Air Recycler

* Power Distributor

* Poison Groove

* Fungal Web

* Viral Injector

* Unstoppable Force Salve

* …perhaps more to discover…
value.name: Therapeutics

value.info_text:
Allows you to create chemical tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Fireproof Coating

* Waterproof Coating

* Black Light Emitter

* Rustproof Coating

* Alchemist's Helper

* Acid Groove

* Flash Powder

* White Light Emitter

* Corrosive Shell

* Winterchill Edge

* Toxic Shell

* Itching Powder

* …perhaps more to discover…
value.name: Chemistry

value.info_text:
Allows you to create explosive tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Botanical Shell

* Incendiary Groove

* Ablative Armour

* Flare Shell

* Solid Shell

* Steamgun

* Magnetic Shell

* Thunder Grenade

* Voltaic Shell

* Hook Shell

* Corrosive Shell

* Antimagic Shell

* Saw Shell

* Explosive Shell

* Hand Cannon

* Toxic Shell

* Thunderclap Coating

* Headlamp

* …perhaps more to discover…
value.name: Explosives

value.info_text: Increases the efficiency of all steamtech you operate, granting 19, 39, 58, 78, 97 steampower.
value.name: Steam Power

value.info_text:
Using psionic forces you maintain in place on your back two giant horrific mechanical arms.

Each basic turn (as if you had 100% speed) they can automatically attack up to 2 foes within range 3 with a mindstar attack doing 95%, 110%, 121%, 131%, 139% weapon damage.

Creatures harassed by the mechanical arms have their damage reduced by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% for 5 turns.
value.name: Mechanical Arms

value.info_text:
Fire a powerful shot at a foe doing 200%, 222%, 238%, 251%, 264% weapon damage.

If the creature, or any creatures in radius 3, was affected by a fear or nightmare effect it violently wakes up, shaking it off only to find itself disoriented, unable to discern friends from foes for 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns.
value.name: Lucid Shot

value.info_text:
Fire a psionic-enhanced shot at a foe doing 80%, 93%, 102%, 111%, 118% mind weapon damage and infecting it with a psy worm for 8 turns.

Each turn the worm will do 30, 41, 49, 56, 63 mind damage and restore 1 psi to you, double if stunned or feared.

Also each turn the worm has 25% chances to spread to a nearby foe in radius 3.

When a creature infected by Psy Worm dies it spreads to all enemies in a radius of 3.
value.name: Psy Worm

value.info_text: Entering the mind of your foe you manipulate it to make it loose hope of defeating you, reducing all its damage by 40% for 3, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns.
value.name: No Hope

value.info_text:
Using small steam motors to enhance your movements, you are able to slip past up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 foes in a line.

After passing the targets, you will quickly run 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 tiles away.
value.name: Slip Away

value.info_text:
The thrill of the hunt invigorates you. For each foe in radius 2, 5, 8, 10, 12 around you, you gain 20% movement speed (up to 60%, 100%, 120%, 160%, 180%).

Current bonus: 0%.
value.name: Agile Gunner

value.info_text:
In an awesome feat of agility and technological prowess, you toss both of your steamguns in the air, causing them to spin madly for 3 turns.

Each turn, they will fire twice at random targets in range, dealing 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% weapon damage.

While the guns are airborne, you are disarmed and cannot attack.

The spectacle is so distracting that your foes have a hard time concentrating on you, increasing all of your resistances by 7%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 22%.
value.name: Awesome Toss

value.info_text:
While your foes are distracted by your Awesome Toss, you use powerful steam motors to jump into the air and kick a target 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 tiles away.

The impact is so great that it ripples outwards, slowing all creatures in radius 3 by 25%, 40%, 48%, 52%, 55% for 4 turns while the reaction force propels you 4, 6, 7, 9, 10 tiles backwards.
value.name: Dazzling Jump

value.info_text:
You open all steam valves at once, releasing a radius 3 wave of superheated steam around yourself which deals 299, 406, 488, 558, 620 fire damage.

If you had at least 50 steam, the vapours will be so hot that they can burn sensory organs, blinding affected creatures for 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 turns.

The effects scale with your current steam value; at 1 steam they are only 15% as effective as at 100 (current factor 100%).
value.name: Emergency Steam Purge

value.info_text:
Your knowledge of physical laws allows you to use and improve equipment in ways their creators never dreamed.

Increases all stats, saves, armour, and defense bonuses by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% on equipment that is crafted by a master or powered by steamtech.
value.name: Innovation

value.info_text:
Using a huge amount of steam, you temporarily supercharge your tinkers and other steam-powered talents.

For 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, you gain 26, 33, 39, 46, 52 steampower and 6%, 11%, 16%, 20%, 24% steamtech critical chance.
value.name: Supercharge Tinkers

value.info_text:
Sometimes, being a master tinker requires taking risks; yours are more calculated than others.

Gain 2, 5, 7, 10, 13 cunning, 8, 15, 20, 25, 30 physical save, 21%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56% resistance to self-inflicted damage, and 9%, 15%, 20%, 25%, 30% chance to avoid being critically hit.
value.name: Last Engineer Standing

value.info_text:
You add a portable furnace to your steam generators.

While it is active your fire and physical damage increases by 9%, 13%, 17%, 21%, 25% and your fire and physical resistance penetration by 9%, 13%, 17%, 21%, 25%.

Burninate all with awesome Steam power!
value.name: Furnace

value.info_text:
While Furnace is on your armour is so hot from the furnace it dissipates parts of all energy based attacks against you.

All non physical, non mind damage is reduced by 19, 28, 37, 46, 55 (current 19, 28, 37, 46, 55).

Each turn this happens you gain a molten point (up to 10), decreasing the efficiency of the reduction by 25%.

Molten points are removed upon running or resting.

Hot liquid metal, the fun!
value.name: Molten Metal

value.info_text:
Open the vents on your furnace, creating a conic blast dealing up to 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage at 10 molten points (currently 0.00).

All molten points are consumed.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.

By fire be purged!
value.name: Furnace Vent

value.info_text:
When you reach 10 molten points your armour overheats, reaching temperatures so high that they cauterize up to 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 detrimental physical effects on you.

A special medical injector injects you with a fire immunity serum at that precise moment to make you immune to the burning effect.

When this happens all molten points are consumed and trigger a Furnace Vent at the creature that triggered the last molten point.

This effect drains 15 steam when triggered, and will not trigger if steam is too low.

It's only a flesh burn!
value.name: Melting Point

value.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using steamguns.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 1, 2, 2, 3.
value.name: Steamgun Mastery

value.info_text:
In an overpowering display of marksmanship, you fire your steamgun(s) twice in rapid succession.

Each shot (targeted separately) deals 45%, 56%, 64%, 70%, 77% damage and stuns its target for 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Steampower.
value.name: Double Shots

value.info_text:
You focus on managing your steamgun ammo for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

While the effect lasts your attacks do not consume shots.
value.name: Uncanny Reload

value.info_text:
You fire a special, electrically charged shot with your steamgun(s) at a spot within range.

When each shot reaches its target, it bursts into electrified shrapnel within radius 2, which shocks each target hit and deals 90%, 103%, 112%, 121%, 128% weapon damage as lightning.

Shocked targets lose up to 1 non-magical effects (for the first shot that hits).

This talent does not use ammo.
value.name: Static Shot

value.info_text:
You have learned to fire while moving.

In one motion, you fire your double steamguns (100% weapon damage, 1 tile range penalty) and may then move to an adjacent tile (unless pinned to the ground or immobilized).

This talent can be activated for up to 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 consecutive turns before it goes on cooldown, and takes time according to your steamtech speed or movement speed (if you move), whichever is slower.

When Strafe ends you may instantly reload between 0 and 0 ammo (based on the number of strafes you performed and your ammo capacity).
value.name: Strafe

value.info_text:
You deliberately fire a missing shot at a target, startling it for 3 turns.

If the target fails a mental save it instinctively recoils two steps back.

The next shot that hits the startled creature will deal 226%, 258%, 282%, 302%, 321% more damage.
value.name: Startling Shot

value.info_text:
Using small engines to augment your reflexes you are able to automatically fire retaliatory shots at your foes doing 96%, 119%, 137%, 152%, 165% weapon damage.

Retaliation shots are fired when you evade/are missed by a melee or ranged attack.

This can only happen once per turn and uses shots as normal.
value.name: Evasive Shots

value.info_text:
Your cunning and dexterity allow you to fire incredible trick shots that can hit multiple targets.

You precisely aim your trick shot to ricochet amongst foes you can see so that whenever it hits something solid (creature or solid wall), it will bounce towards the next closest foe.

It may ricochet up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 times (or until it misses) within range 5 of your first target and will not target the same foe twice.

Your shot deals 100%, 117%, 130%, 141%, 151% weapon damage on its first strike, but loses 35%, 24%, 18%, 14%, 12% damage and 0(44%, 31%, 23%, 19%, 16%) accuracy with each bounce.
value.name: Trick Shot

value.info_text:
Quickly aggregate particles of metal around your mindstar and focus psionic energies into it.

The metal explodes like shrapnel, knocking back (3, 3, 4, 5, 5 away) and dazing (5, 7, 8, 10, 11 duration) all foes in radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9.
value.name: Metalstar

value.info_text:
When you fire your metalstar, your also establish a psionic bloodlink with the shrapnel still inside for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Each turn the victims are drained for 28, 38, 46, 53, 59 physical damage, half of which heals you (each additional victim healing is reduced by half).

If the victim move more than twice away from the radius of Metalstar (currently 0) the effect stops.

This damage does not break daze and increases with your Steampower.
value.name: Bloodstar

value.info_text:
Your bloodstar effect also burns part of your victim's flesh, dealing 28, 38, 46, 53, 59 fire damage.

The intensity of the fire generates steam which you psionically absorb through gestalt, providing 4, 7, 9, 11, 12 steam each turn (each additional victim steam generation is reduced by 66%).

This damage does not break daze and increases with your Steampower.
value.name: Steamstar

value.info_text: When you use a shoot class talent to hit a creature affected by bloodstar an other shoot talent will have its current cooldown reduced by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 turns.
value.name: Deathstar

value.info_text: The medical urgency vest allows using therapeutics with 0% efficiency and cooldown mod of 100%.
value.name: Medical Urgency Vest

value.info_text: The life support suit allows using therapeutics with 0% efficiency and cooldown mod of 100%.
value.name: Life Support

value.info_text: Allows you to create tinkers.
value.name: Create Tinker

value.info_text: Deploy a Weapon Automaton based on a selected one handed melee item. The Automaton will wield the selected weapon and drop it when it times out or is destroyed. Aside from the weapon selected, the Automaton will scale off Tinker talent levels, your own stats, and other things that will be described in this tooltip at some point.
value.name: Weapon Automaton: One Handed

value.info_text:
Fires your ammo at an enemy in range 10 for 151%, 194%, 226%, 253%, 278% weapon damage. If this tinker is made of voratun you will fire an additional shot.

This shot is a ranged melee attack but will use the ranged procs of your ammo as well.
value.name: Hand Cannon

value.info_text:
Quickly create a psionic-enhanced metal contraption that lures all your foes to it and reflects 30% of the damage it takes to its attackers.

The contraption will have 720, 976, 1174, 1342, 1491 life and last 5 turns.

Damage, life, resists, and armor scale with your Steampower.
value.name: Fatal Attractor

value.info_text:
Activate the rocket boots, firing huge flames from your boots increasing your movement speed by 114%, 180%, 245%, 310%, 375%.

Each movement will leave a trail of flames doing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 fire damage for 4 turns.

Doing any other actions will break the effect.

Burninate them all!
value.name: Rocket Boots

value.info_text:
Activate the pistons to crush your target for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns and dealing 165%, 184%, 199%, 211%, 222% unarmed melee damage.

While the target is held it can not move and its armour and defense are reduced by 35, 47, 57, 65, 72.

Crush their bones!
value.name: Iron Grip

value.info_text: Grab the target and pull them towards you, striking for 130%, 152%, 168%, 181%, 194% unarmed melee damage, and if you hit, pinning them for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns.
value.name: Spring Grapple

value.info_text:
Launch a cannister filled with toxic gas at a location.

Every 2 turns the cannister emits a poison cloud of radius 3 around it each turn.

The poison does 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 nature damage over 5 turns.

The cannister has 720, 976, 1174, 1342, 1491 life and lasts 8 turns. When it ends or is destroyed a last cloud is created.

Damage, life, resists, and armor scale with your Steampower.

Damage and penetration are inherited from the creator.
value.name: Toxic Cannister Launcher

value.info_text:
Activate the armour's active defense system.

A flow of electricity covers your armour to attenuate the force of energy attacks while small steam engines move key pieces of the armour to attenuate physical attacks.

All damage except mind damage is reduced by a flat 58, 79, 95, 109, 121.

In addition the electric power of the armour sometimes leaks, each turn there is a 50% chance to produce a electrical arc toward a foe, dealing 26, 36, 43, 49, 55 to 79, 108, 129, 148, 164 lightning damage to all foes in radius 1.

The effects increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Steam Powered Armour

value.info_text:
You fire a cone of blighted needles, hitting everything in a frontal cone of radius 4, 5, 5, 6, 7 for 79, 108, 129, 148, 164 physical damage.

Each creature hit has a 32%, 39%, 45%, 50%, 54% chance of being infected by a random disease, doing 21, 29, 35, 39, 44 blight damage and reducing either Constitution, Strength or Dexterity by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 for 20 turns.

The damage and disease effects increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Viral Needlegun

value.info_text: You shred pieces of sandwalls. Brrrmmm!.
value.name: Sand Shredder

value.info_text:
Throw a cone of flame with radius 4, 5, 6, 7, 8

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Flamethrower

value.info_text:
Throw a cone of healing with radius 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, healing other mechanical creatures (steam spiders) for 608, 824, 991, 1133, 1259.

The healing will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Mass Repair

value.info_text:
Let out a technopsionic wave that silences for 3, 4, 5, 5, 6 turns all those affected in a radius of 5, 8, 10, 11, 13, including the user.

The silence chance will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Arcane Disruption Wave

value.info_text:
Shatters the mind of your victim, giving you full control over its actions for 6 turns.

When the effect ends, you pull out your mind and the victim's body collapses, dead.

This effect does not work on rares, bosses, or undead.

.
value.name: Mind Crush

value.info_text:
Touch a creature to release a nasty electrical charge into them, doing 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 lightning damage.

If this tinker is above tier 1, the electricity can arc to another target up to 2 tiles away.

The number of enemies hit is at most the tinker tier.

The damage increases with your Steampower.
value.name: Shocking Touch

Throw a handful of dust that rapidly oxidises, releasing a blinding light.

Creatures in a cone of radius 4, 5, 5, 6, 7 are blinded for 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The blindness effect is applied with your Steampower.
value.name: Flash Powder

Throw a handful of dust that is very itchy to touch.

Creatures in a cone of radius 4, 5, 5, 6, 7 are itchy for 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 turns, causing them to fail talents 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 45% of the time.

The itchiness effect is applied with your Steampower.
value.name: Itching Powder

value.info_text:
Throw a grenade at your foes, dealing 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 physical damage in radius 1.

Creatures hit will also be stunned for 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 turns.

The stun effect is applied with your Steampower.
value.name: Thunder Grenade

You activate hidden springs to project a saw towards your foes.

Fires a bolt of lightning, doing 242, 328, 394, 451, 501 lightning damage.

Place an electrically charged sentry device at a location.

Damage, life, resists, and armor scale with your Steampower.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.
value.name: Flare Shell

You fire a special explosive shot with your steamgun(s) at a spot within range.

When each shot reaches its target, it does normal steamgun damage and releases 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 explosive charges in a radius of 2.

These charges will shortly explode for 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 fire damage in a radius of 1.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.
value.name: Incendiary Shell

You fire a special solid shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 177%, 230%, 270%, 304%, 335% physical weapon damage.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

If you target a creature, they are pulled up to 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 tiles towards you.

If you target an empty tile, you are pulled up to 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 tiles towards it.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

value.name: Voltaic Shell

You fire a special antimagic shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 100% normal weapon damage.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

Sap damage scales with Steampower.
value.name: Antimagic Shell

The shot will release spores which grow into Nourishing Moss in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 1, 2 for 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns.

Each turn the moss deals 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 nature damage to each foe within its radius.

This moss has vampiric properties and heals the user for 67%, 86%, 100%, 111%, 120% of the damage done.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

Moss damage scales with Steampower.
value.name: Botanical Shell

You fire a special corrosive shot with your steamgun(s) at a target for 151%, 194%, 226%, 253%, 278% weapon damage as acid.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

value.name: Corrosive Shell

The shot will release heavy metals into the target, inflicting 42, 53, 62, 70, 76 blight damage per turn and reducing their global speed by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

This talent does not use ammo as it is the ammo.

Toxin strength scales with Steampower.
value.name: Toxic Shell

value.info_text:
For 8, 12, 14, 16, 16 turns, you lay down Grasping Moss where you walk or stand.

The moss is placed automatically every step and lasts 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns.

Each turn the moss deals 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 nature damage to each foe standing on it.

This moss is very thick and sticky causing all foes passing through it have their movement speed reduced by 39%, 49%, 56%, 61%, 65% and have a 27%, 35%, 41%, 46%, 50% chance to be pinned to the ground for 4 turns.

The damage scales with your Steampower.
value.name: Moss Tread

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using steamguns.

When your bullets hit a target your instinctively reach out to the impact and use the kinetic force to project a mindstar attack doing 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% damage (guaranteed hit), if you wield one in the offhand.

This projection requires a pure mindstar, it will no work if extended into a psiblade.

Also activable for a shoot that deals 140%, 162%, 178%, 191%, 204% weapon damage as mind damage.
value.name: Psyshot

Using psionic energies you overheat your shot, making it deal 141%, 166%, 185%, 202%, 216% damage.

If the shot hits a wet foe it will vaporize, removing the wet effect and dealing 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage in a radius 4.
value.name: Boiling Shot

value.name: Blunt Shot

Attach a psionic steam device to a shot doing 166%, 189%, 207%, 222%, 235% weapon damage.

When it hits a foe the device activates, violently sucking all the air nearby, pulling in all creatures in radius 3, 5, 6, 7, 7.

value.info_text:
Hits the target on the arms with one rotating saw doing 130%, 143%, 152%, 161%, 168% damage and trying to maim it for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.

Maimed foes deal 23%, 33%, 37%, 40%, 42% less damage.

The chance improves with your Physical power.

Cutting your foes has never been so simple!
value.name: To The Arms

You "gently" slam your saws into the wounds of a creature, dealing 70%, 87%, 100%, 111%, 121% weapon damage and deepening the wounds.

All bleeding wounds durations are increased by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turns and the damage by 170%, 230%, 277%, 317%, 352% (this may be done only once per bleeding effect).

When this happens a gush of blood is projected in a narrow cone of radius 4, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 physical damage to all creatures.

The power and damage improves with your Steampower.

The marvels of technology, now at the service of true butchery!
value.name: Bloodstream

value.info_text:
You try to sever the spine of your foe, reducing its global speed by 27%, 41%, 47%, 50%, 52% for 4 turns and dealing 105%, 124%, 139%, 151%, 162% weapon damage.

The power of the blow also removes up to 1 physical effects.

If your talent level is at least 3 1 physical or magical sustains are also removed.

Break them, grind them, mow them down!
value.name: Spinal Break

value.info_text:
When you kill a foe you place small explosives with shrapnels inside its body, making it explode in radius 5.

Any foes hit will bleed for 17, 23, 27, 31, 35 damage per turn for 6 turns. The shrapnels also damage the vocal cords (or related organ), silencing them for 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns.

Use the finest of wartech now: shrapnels. For blood and mayhem!
value.name: Goresplosion

Using psionic energies you temporarily alter your blood, turning it into molten iron.

When affected by molten blood all creatures that hit you in melee take 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 fire damage, all your resistances are increased by 6%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 22% and all new detrimental effects on you have their duration reduced by 8%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 27%.

Damage increases with your Steampower.

Melding psionics with steamtech you create 5 mind drones at your sides that fly towards your target.

If they encounter a creature they will latch on it and bore into its skull for 6 turns, disrupting its thoughts.

Disrupted creatures have 21%, 28%, 32%, 35%, 37% chances to fail to use talents and suffer a -41%, -59%, -63%, -65%, -66% reduction to fear and sleep immunity.
value.name: Mind Drones

You cleanse your mind of 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 mental debuffs.

Cleansed effects will be randomly sent to closeby foes (range 5, subject to a mental save).

Also if the target is protected by a temporary damage shield there is 34%, 70%, 80%, 85%, 88% chance to shatter it.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.

If the spot is reached and occupied, you will perform a free melee attack against the target there.

This attack does 120% weapon damage and can daze the target for 3 turns if it hits.

You must rush from at least 2 tiles away.
value.name: Rush

If the attack hits, the target is dazed for 3 turns.

value.info_text:
Allows you to use melee weapons to focus your spells, granting a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance per melee attack to cast an offensive spell as a free action on the target.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown, but only works if the spell is not already cooling down.

You may select an allowed spell to trigger this way, or choose to have one randomly selected for each attack.

While wielding a shield, the chance is reduced by one quarter.

While dual wielding, the chance is reduced by half for both weapons.

The chance increases with your Cunning.

Allowed spells: Flame, Pulverizing Auger, Lightning, Earthen Missiles
value.name: Arcane Combat

value2.info_text:
Allows you to use a melee weapon to focus your spells, granting a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance per melee attack to deliver a Flame, Lightning or Earthen Missiles spell as a free action on the target.

When using a shield the chance is reduced by one fourth.

When dual wielding or using a shield the chance is halved for each weapon.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown, but only works if the spell is not cooling down.

The chance increases with your Cunning.
value2.name: Arcane Combat

value.info_text:
Raw magical damage channels through the caster's weapon, increasing raw Physical Power by 0.21, 0.43, 0.59, 0.73, 0.86 of your Magic (current bonus: 20, 42, 59, 73, 85).

Each time you crit with a melee blow, you will unleash a radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 ball of either fire, lightning or arcane damage, doing 109, 148, 187, 226, 265.

The bonus scales with your Spellpower and talent level.

If you are using a shield this will only occur 75% of the time.

If you are dual wielding this will only occur 50% of the time.

At level 5 the ball becomes radius 2.
value.name: Arcane Destruction

Accuracy reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.

Dash forward using rockets.

If the spot is reached and occupied, you will perform a free melee attack against the target there.

This attack does 130% weapon damage.

You must dash from at least 2 tiles away.
value.name: Rocket Dash

value.info_text:
Dash forward using rockets.

If the spot is reached and occupied, you will perform a free melee attack against the target there and knock them back 4 spaces as well as anyone else they collide with.

This attack does 180% weapon damage.

You must dash from at least 2 tiles away.

value.info_text: While activated, your basic Shot talent now fires 3 times, with each attack dealing 35%, 46%, 54%, 60%, 67% Ranged damage, at a cost of 25 Stamina per attack.
value.name: Bombardment

value.info_text: Your understanding of physiology allows you to apply your reflexes in new ways. Whenever you would receive damage (from any source) greater than 26%, 19%, 16%, 14%, 13% of your maximum life you reduce that damage by 7.9%, 14%, 18%, 21%, 23% (based on your Defense).

When your life dips below 50% of your total life an automated process turns some of your lower skin layers (or other internal organs) into a thick metallic layer for 6 turns.

While the effect lasts all damage done to you is reduced by a flat amount equal to 100% of your Constitution.

This effect can only trigger once every 10 turns.
value.name: Subcutaneous Metallisation

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with an elemental aura. When you deal a critical hit with an element, you have a chance to trigger a special effect.

Arcane damage has a 30% chance to increase your spellcasting speed by 20% for 5 turns.

Fire damage has a 30% chance to cleanse all physical or magical detrimental effects on you.

Cold damage has a 30% chance to turn your skin into ice for 5 turns, reducing physical damage taken by 30%, increasing armor by 20, 26, 35, 42, 50, and dealing 100 ice damage to attackers.

Lightning damage has a 30% chance to transform you into pure lightning for 5 turns; any damage will displace you to an adjacent tile and ignore the damage (can only happen once per turn).

Light damage has a 30% chance to create a barrier around you, absorbing 120, 150, 200, 250, 300 damage for 5 turns.

Nature damage has a 30% chance to harden your skin, preventing the application of any magical detrimental effects for 5 turns.

The Cold and Light effects scale with your Cunning.

These effects only trigger for hits over 4, 40, 100, 160, 200 damage (based on your level).
value.name: Elemental Surge
require: Level 30, Cun 50; Have dealt over 50000 arcane, fire, cold, lightning, light or nature damage

Additionally, all of your damage penalties from invisibility are permanently halved.

value.info_text:
Set up some cunning contingency plans in case of death.

If you die you will have the option to raise back from the dead once, but at the cost of becoming a ghoul or a skeleton, at random.

When rising this way you will lose access to your racial tree, if any, get refunded for half the points you spent in it and gain access to the ghoul or skeleton racial tree.

As undead are not able to use infusions you will lose any that you may have upon turning.

Each turn the moss deals 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 nature damage to each foe within its radius.

The moss lasts 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

value.info_text:
Gaze at your foes and turn them to stone for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Stoned creatures are unable to act or regen life, and are very brittle.

If a stoned creature is hit by an attack that deals more than 30% of its life, it will shatter and be destroyed.

Stoned creatures are highly resistant to fire and lightning, and somewhat resistant to physical attacks.

This spell may fail against creatures resistant to being stunned, that are specifically immune to stoning, or certain bosses.
value.name: Petrifying Gaze

value.info_text:
Sting the target with your ovipositor, injecting 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 larvae into it to finish their hatching process.

Over a 5 turn gestation period, the larvae will feed on the victim internally, dealing 2.86, 3.73, 6.58, 9.87, 11 to 14, 19, 33, 49, 54 physical damage each turn (increasing as they grow).

After the gestation period is complete, each larva will rip itself free of its host, dealing 14, 19, 22, 25, 27 physical and 14, 19, 22, 25, 27 fire damage.
